DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the effect of dexamethasone combined with ondansetron on postoperative nausea and vomiting in patients with patient-controlled analgesia after video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Dexamethasone Combined With Ondansetron on Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting in Patients With Patient-controlled Analgesia After Video-assisted Thoracoscopic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing videoassisted thoracoscopic surgery Age 2075 American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status classification I or II Antiemetic within 24 hrs Taking Steroids, Opioids within 1 week Active drug or alcohol abuse GI motility disorder, severe renal/ hepatic disease.
DOC.keyword: Postoperative nausea and vomiting after video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery
